name: Welcome To Jackson
description:
Welcome to Jackson! You are Buckley, a visiting alien that has come to check out Jackson and see the local sights. However, the streets of Jackson can often be unforgiving, even unfair at times. Swipe up to jump over obstacles and swipe down to duck under them. Pray that the city grants you a fair path as you try to complete each level's given objective.

-Simple, but Addictive Gameplay
-Swipe Up to Jump
-Swipe Down to Duck
